traits.name: Aberrant Form
entries: The zealot exudes the chaos of the Far Realm. Any non-Aberration creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of Shalfi must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage.

traits.name: Weirdly Pliable
entries: The zealot, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, is unnaturally flexible. The zealot can move through any space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The zealot makes one Psychic Rend attack and two Shortsword attacks.

actions.name: Psychic Rend
entries: {@atk ms,rs} +7 to hit, reach 15 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. 14 (3d6 + 4 damage) psychic damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or have the {@condition stunned} condition until the start of Shalfi's next turn.

actions.name: Shortsword
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4 damage) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6 damage) psychic damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The zealot casts one of the following spells, requiring no components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}):
